extendedInfo.description: After "The Event" humanity lies in shambles. Lawless marauders terrorize the last remnants of civilization. The only remaining habitable areas are remote tropical islands. It is up to you and those like you to fight back the forces of chaos and help restore law and order to the world. Form a powerful alliance and start rebuilding civilization one island at a time! Build your base, rally your troops, and engage in combat with thousands of other players online! Battle Beach is an exciting combination of city building, tower defense, and fast-paced real time combat with other live opponents. Raise an unstoppable army of snipers, tanks, and mighty Exo-Suits. Forge an alliance with other players and rise through the ranks. Fend off the Marauder hordes and restore order to a world lost in chaos. -- FEATURES -- * Upgrade your base into an impenetrable beacon of hope. * Battle other real players all over the world and take their Medals. * Forge a powerful alliance with other players and rise up the global ranks * Wage war against the Marauder Leader in an epic single player campaign. * 10 unique units with multiple upgrade levels * Defend your base with Machine Gun Nests, Sniper Towers, Mine Fields, and Walls. NOTE: Network connection required to play.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Awesome graphics great characters. Just really good
reviews.author: Finlay Ainsworth

reviews.title: I love this game
reviews.comment: Just wish I could keep the soldiers that don\'t die when you win or end a battle. But I really like playing this game to pass time.
reviews.author: Brian Jones

reviews.title: Not bad so far, but I\'m still very early into the game...
reviews.comment: Its ok, I like the resources and items you can buy to fortify your HQ and your land. I don\'t like that I have to purchase anything with real money to go beyond a certain point in the game as your resources grow less and less. There\'s very little you can do to speed up production without actual cash, so for that it gets 4 stars.
reviews.author: Andre Walker

reviews.title: Fun and addicting but battery drainer
reviews.comment: Game is quite entertaining but drains the battery quick. The upgrade system runs in the background thus draining the battery. Also the notifications become annoying but useful. Overall: 4/5
